Text:

Hey EinDeutschMan,

Kind Regards,

lancelotofcamelot

Hi EinDeutschMan,

Where is the content folder you want the contents folder in the ISO to be merged with ? I can't find it.

Kind Regards,

lancelotofcamelot

@lancelotofcamelot,

Actually, this ISO is for anyone who cannot get the German Language packs installed correctly.
You DO NOT need this ISO if you have gotten the German packs installed and activated.
This ISO simply does some of the work for you.

It requires you to DL and install these two ISO's first (in this order)

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7035540/Rosetta_Stone_v3__amp_amp__Patch.iso
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7035678/Rosetta_Stone_v3.4.7_w_Patch.iso

If you ONLY want to have German installed (right now), copy the contents of this ISO to your C: drive, and allow it to merge with your ProgramData folder. 

You will end up with "C:/ProgramData/Rosetta Stone/Content"
The Content folder is where the language file are located.

Again, if you ONLY want to have German installed right now and you HAVE NOT installed any language packs, then disregard the part about merging this content folder with yours, as you will not have one yet.

Then copy and edit the two xml files as outlined in the readme.txt file. 

1. Rename the GermanProducts.xml to Products.xml
2. Edit the DynamicStoredPaths.xml to point to where ever your tracking.db3 file is.
3. Edit the DynamicStoredPaths.xml so the LanguageDataBasePath line points to the Content folder you copied from this ISO.

AGAIN, do this ONLY if you DO NOT have any other languages installed.
